verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David שָׂ֭מַחְתִּי <S%H8055><s%> mach-ti I was glad בְּאֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> be-'o-me-Rim when they said לִ֑י Li; בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ne-Lech. go

עֹ֭מְדוֹת <S%H5975><s%> 'O-me-dot shall stand הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become רַגְלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-nu; Our feet בִּ֝שְׁעָרַ֗יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Ra-yich, within thy gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. O Jerusalem

יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem הַבְּנוּיָ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> hab-be-nu-Yah; is builded כְּ֝עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ke-'Ir, as a city שֶׁחֻבְּרָה־ <S%H2266><s%> she-chub-be-rah- that is compact לָּ֥הּ lah יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav. together

שֶׁשָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> shesh-Sham Whither עָל֪וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu go up שְׁבָטִ֡ים <S%H7626><s%> she-va-Tim the tribes שִׁבְטֵי־ <S%H7626><s%> shiv-tei- the tribes יָ֭הּ <S%H3050><s%> yah of the LORD עֵד֣וּת <S%H5715><s%> 'e-Dut unto the testimony לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לְ֝הֹד֗וֹת <S%H3034><s%> le-ho-Dot, to give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> le-Shem unto the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For שָׁ֨מָּה׀ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there יָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu For there are set כִסְא֣וֹת <S%H3678><s%> chis-'ot thrones לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> le-mish-Pat; of judgment כִּ֝סְא֗וֹת <S%H3678><s%> kis-'ot, the thrones לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. of David

שַׁ֭אֲלוּ <S%H7592><s%> 'a-lu Pray שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> she-Lom for the peace יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem יִ֝שְׁלָ֗יוּ <S%H7951><s%> yish-La-yu, they shall prosper אֹהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Va-yich. that love

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- become שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom Peace בְּחֵילֵ֑ךְ <S%H2426><s%> be-chei-Lech; be within thy walls שַׁ֝לְוָ֗ה <S%H7962><s%> le-Vah, [and] prosperity בְּאַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H759><s%> be-'ar-me-no-Ta-yich. within thy palaces

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> Le-ma-'an the sake אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chai For my brethren וְרֵעָ֑י <S%H7453><s%> ve-re-'Ai; and companions' אֲדַבְּרָה־ <S%H1696><s%> 'a-dab-be-rah- sakes I will now say נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na will now שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom Peace בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> Le-ma-'an the sake בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- Because of the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God אֲבַקְשָׁ֖ה <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Shah I will seek ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov thy good לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
